mapper.select: select ifnull(c.count,0) as waybillCount, count(1) as forDispenseCount from t_waybill a left join (select transporter_company_id,count(1) as count from t_waybill group by transporter_company_id ) c on c.transporter_company_id = a.transporter_company_id where a.`status` = 0 and a.dispense_status = 0 and a.transporter_company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) as carCount , count(case when datediff(insurance_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) > 7 then 0 end) insuranceSuccessCount, count(case when datediff(insurance_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) < 7 then 0 end) insuranceFailureCount, count(case when datediff(tax_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) > 7 then 0 end) taxSuccessCount, count(case when datediff(tax_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) < 7 then 0 end) taxFailureCount, count(case when datediff(check_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) > 7 then 0 end) checkSuccessCount, count(case when datediff(check_end_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}) < 7 then 0 end) checkFailureCount from t_car where company_id =#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ifnull(b.count,0) as successCount, ifnull(count(1) -b.count,count(1)) as failureCount from t_car a left join ( select company_id,count(1) as count from t_car_daily_inspection where inspection_date = #{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by company_id )b on b.company_id = a.company_id where a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ifnull(b.count,0) as restSuccessCount, ifnull(count(1) -b.count,count(1)) as restFailureCount from t_car a left join ( select company_id,count(1) as count ,car_id from t_car_drive_rest where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = 0 )b on a.id = b.car_id where a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.car_id as carId,t.create_date as restCreateDate,t.type as restType,t.restCountMinute, b.`name` as carName,b.code ,c.surname,c.name as name from ( select company_id,car_id ,create_date,type,driver_id,TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,create_date,#{currentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) as restCountMinute from t_car_drive_rest a where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and not exists ( select 1 from t_car_drive_rest where company_id = a.company_id and car_id = a.car_id and a.create_date < create_date ) )t left join t_car b on t.car_id = b.id left join t_user c on t.driver_id = c.id

select a.id as carId,a.`name` as carName,a.code ,c.surname,c.name as name, ifnull(b.count,0) as dailyInspenctionCount,b.faultCount from t_car a left join t_user c on a.driver_id = c.id left join ( select car_id,count(1) as count, (engine_oil_count+air_coolant_count+tyre_count+signal_light_count+safety_equipment_count+documents_count) as faultCount from t_car_daily_inspection where inspection_date = #{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by car_id )b on b.car_id = a.id where a.company_id =#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.inspection_date as inspenctionDate , a.engine_oil_id as engioneOilId, a.engine_oil_count as engineOilCount, a.air_pressure_coolant_id as airPressureCoolantId, a.air_pressure_coolant_count as airPressureCoolantCount, a.tire_id as tireId, a.tire_count as tireCount, a.indicator_light_id as indicatorLightId, a.indicator_light_count as indicatorLightCount, a.safety_equipment_id as safetyEquipmentId, a.safety_equipment_count as safetyEquipmentCount from t_car_daily_inspection a where a.car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.inspection_date = #{currentDate,jdbcType=DATE}

select ifnull(b.count,0) as waybillCount, count(1) as forLoadingCount from t_waybill a left join (select driver_id,count(1) as count from t_waybill where status =0 and dispense_status = 1 and driver_id =#{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) b on b.driver_id = a.driver_id where a.transporter_company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
